title: Here is a list of 20 articles on reviewing in Natural Language Processing (NLP) research, published before 2021. These articles cover various aspects of NLP, including surveys, reviews, and comprehensive overviews of specific subfields within NLP
**"A Survey of Text Summarization Techniques"** by Ani Nenkova and Kathleen McKeown
*Computational Linguistics*
**"A Survey on Sentiment Analysis: Challenges and Solutions"** by Medhat
**"A Survey of Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis"** by Bo Pang and Lillian Lee
*Foundations and Trends in Information Retrieval*
**"A Survey of Named Entity Recognition and Classification"** by David Nadeau and Satoshi Sekine
*Lingvisticae Investigationes*
**"A Survey on Automatic Text Summarization"** by Gupta, Vishal, and Gurpreet Singh Lehal
*Journal of Emerging Technologies in Web Intelligence*
**"A Survey of Recent Advances in Hierarchical Text Classification"** by Kowsari, Kamran, et al
